website_summaries.verdict: Performance and construction similar to costlier models. Solid satisfaction guarantee. The best choice if you're looking for a budget buy.
pros: Features sturdy 8-inch design for a low price
ProTouch grips provide comfortable padding for increased leverage
cons: The cutting feature has a tendency to dull, especially when cutting thick wire

customer_reviews.title: Great cutters
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cut faux flower stems because I got sick of having to ask my husband to cut them with my little wimpy cutters. These work wonderfully and I can cut the thickest wire stems by myself.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dement

customer_reviews.title: No gap in cutting surface!
customer_reviews.text: I chose these cutters because the cutting surfaces go all the way to the hinge area. Most other cutters have a small gap at the bottom edge of the cutter ... so small wires get into the gap ... and don't get cut. It was frustrating, because you have to take the time to line up the wire to avoid the gap. But with these Irwins, you just slide the wire in ... and snip! Saves alot of time!
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Guy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cutting pliers
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cutting pliers, I use cutting pliers weekly, for making floral arrangments, cutting floral wire, etc. The cost of this item is very reasonable compared to my local Hardware Store prices, plus this product feels great in your hand, has a nice grip, and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cutters
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair Just last week I was working on a Motor home electric system No A/C no fans about 120 degrees inside the unit Got everything done A/C working and all the outlets I hurry up and grab what I thought was all my tools And low and behold I left the cutter's in a sealed up compartment under the bed I don't like buying tools over again unless they break These are very good cutter well worth the money So this time I didn't mind buying again knowing I'm getting a quality tool
customer_reviews.author: Bill T.

customer_reviews.title: Wire cutters
customer_reviews.text: Have used different off brands of wire cutter's and these provide a decent cut to wire weld fencing I'm modifying. Used on 14 gauge wire on down to narrower wires, Works fine. Only negative to myself is "Made in China. thus 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mtnman

customer_reviews.title: Yes, This Cutter Is TOUGH!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to get under the head and washer to cut the hardened corrugated panel nail times a lot of them to remove the panels on my 40 plus years old green house. My strength is not what it used to be, so I added a couple of 12" pipes to the handles for leverage. I know, I voided the warranty, but, had to get rid of the green house. Job done! To make a long story short. The IRWIN DIAGONAL CUTTERS took the abuse and are still like brand new.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Big 'ol dikes
customer_reviews.text: I got these specifically to take the abuse I don't want to apply to my ritzy small electronics tools. I use them to cut things like steel or SS welding rod, fence wire and so on. Being big gives more leverage, and also makes it easy to re-file the jaws should they need it (not yet, they seem pretty hard).
customer_reviews.author: DCFusor

customer_reviews.title: Yup!  Pretty much the best cutting pliers I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: These made it easy to cut through power wires as if they weren't there. The handles were thick and comfortable, and with a lot of leverage. What can I say? They cut. They cut well. They cut comfortably. They seem like they'll still be cutting in years. I'm happy to have gotten them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hold up to abuse and a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I’m hard on side cutters, not on purpose, I just use them all the time in my bags. I’m a carpenter but am the resident wiring guru for a contracting firm. Main panels, sub panels, any kind of wiring snafus. I use these all day long and they hold up well. When working as a carpenter I used them to cut off excess length of finish nails or to pull finish nails that curl around because they hit another nail head underneath. Overall a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R. Haller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for home use
customer_reviews.text: These Irwin diagonal cutters do an excellent job and feel good in your hands. I have cut multiple wires (up to 10 gauge) and wire ties with no issues. The dikes are comfortable and don't feel slippery. They appear to be durable and should be good for DIY residential usage.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dewd

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have a few other Irwin vice grip tools, so when I needed a sidecutter, and saw this on sale, figured I'd grab it since I've had no issues with the other tools from them. Solidly built, grips are comfortable and solid. Hinge is smooth, no wiggle between sides. For the price, it was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: LegoDadTop Contributor: Architecture

customer_reviews.title: Suits my needs perfectly!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought to help me with cutting faux flower stems. The tools available in the craft stores aren't ' up to snuff ', especially when you have a little arthritis in your hands. I used them this morning for the first time and they were great!! Worth the extra money..
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great for cutting artificial flower stems
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to cut the wire stems on artificial flowers. These are sturdy, have some heft to them and cut the stems very well. I expect them to hold up for a considerable time. Easy to use, nice coated handles. They slice through the wire stems easily.
customer_reviews.author: Siamese Lover

customer_reviews.title: these cut through my thick silk flower stems
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these to cut the stems on my silk flowers to make arrangements. These cutters work well and feel durable and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: raakswbl

customer_reviews.title: Used Item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a new IRWIN VISE-GRIP Diagonal Cutting Pliers, 8" and was upset to see the pliers had been used before. There was visible adhesive removed from the blade. I do not mind as the product is well-made enough to last me my whole lifetime but I am upset with the fact I paid for a new item and got a used one that was repackaged to appear new.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Berryman

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea what was really needed to deal with the heavy wire problem I had, but these pliers were just perfect. I didn't have to get frustrated or call on a neighbor to help me with my task. So happy to add them to my toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Rivet Failure.
customer_reviews.text: Owned them a couple of years, but only used a dozen or so times. Quit cutting, noticed that the rivet was failing causing the jaws not to meet centered.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: These are very good quality and you can not beat the price
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality and you can not beat the price. I would call them a homeowner version, but that is exactly what I needed and not a set that cost 4 times as much. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Irwin on demand
customer_reviews.text: Ok, These are for the office, where occasionally I need to do something. I got IRWIN because I can know they will work well when I need them. Not OFF THE TRUCK cost but great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Wink

customer_reviews.title: Not to buy This Pliers
customer_reviews.text: The secon time I used it.. Just to cut a thin strap band... The tip broke off... So Sad That I cant Return them since they only gave little time if I wanted to return.. Bad Buy
customer_reviews.author: sergio godinez

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cut heavy duty zip ties that were holding a tarp in place over my balcony for the winter. Plain scissors weren't working, but these did the trick! These will also come in handy for clipping artificial flower wires...would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Im a cable tech, my company issues klein cutters (which are good) however when you can find something better then why not buy that product? especially if its affordable. These feel great in my hands and I feel like I can cut dang near anything with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for House Wiring and General Wire Cutting
customer_reviews.text: These pliars are great for house wiring and cutting medium wire. Do not use these on hardened wire or large steel wire. I use these to cut house wiring to length because they give me more cutting leverage than Lineman Side Cutter Pliers. It is also easy for me to see exactly where I am cutting and get close to devices when I am cutting. I used them to add two electrical outlets for my cable amplifier and home ethernet network switch. I also use these to cut coax cable when I don't have my cable cutters. I like the insulated handles in case I get into a live wire by mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Charles G. Kerns

customer_reviews.title: Nice large diagonal cutters
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty big diagonal cutters. They cut 10AWG wire no problem, which is the biggest I've tried so far. They seem solidly built and move nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: HOOAH!!!
customer_reviews.text: These work and feel great but just so ya know, they don't cut flush as the cutting jaws have a double bevel. They leave about a 1/16" lip.
customer_reviews.author: The Headster!  HOOAH!!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I make crafts and often cut heavy wired flower stems... I was having a horrible time doing this and then saw these. They are awesome and require very little pressure for me to cut through the toughest stems. Makes my job so much easier. Nice weight too.
customer_reviews.author: staceysmom

customer_reviews.title: Needed this size
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be quality built, and a little longer size then what I already had. Speedy delivery and well packaged. Thank you for your time and consideration
customer_reviews.author: louise a rhinehart

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves them
customer_reviews.text: Got these for the wife so she will stay out of my tool box :) Now she has her own pair for arts and crafts. Cuts like butter.
customer_reviews.author: Splat

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and looks good doing it
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color scheme, look and feel with these wire cutters. I consider them a little pricey but I was willing to pay it given the Vise Grip brand reputation.
customer_reviews.author: ssalava

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cutters, buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: Only used them a few times. I tried cutting a wire staple during a renovation demo and the tip cracked off. Metal casting seems to be very brittle. You get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good Plies
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had any issues yet. Seem to be sturdy and useful for cutting 12ga Romex and small nail without damage to the tool.
customer_reviews.author: hdude

customer_reviews.title: Great diagonal cutter
customer_reviews.text: Great wire cutters comparable to Snap-on or any major brand tools works great price was very good delivered on time
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S Stough

customer_reviews.title: Great cutters, very strong!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these. They are very strong and cut through all kinds of floral stems. I was making 13 floral arrangements for my daughters wedding. Artificial flowers, they cut through everything so easily! Loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool
customer_reviews.text: Really like these side cutters -- they fit well in my hand, allowing for lots of good cutting pressure.
customer_reviews.author: ShadeTree Mechanic

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am an event creator and needed this tool for my job. It came in super fast, it’s lightweight, and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily DL

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the heck out of these pliers and still do to this day. Great tool but does not hold up compared to higher end brands like Klein and Southwire. Good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are my wire clippers. They're easy to use. A wife needs her own tools
customer_reviews.author: Crystal S

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Vice grips I have at work which ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Vice grips I have at work which are good expensive ones from a tool truck cannot touch these. The sharp edge dulls and bends on the ones I have at work. Used and abused these and still look great
customer_reviews.author: MISTER&MRSTWOTURBO

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mainly because of the brand and the price. I've used them for about a week now with no issues. They work well and are easy for me to grip and use with one hand in most cases. I work in electronic recycling and have to cut various types of cords, cables and wires throughout the day. Update: Still using these it's now August and they are still holding up and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Rabb

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: My hands are small, and these were just too big. I'm a girl making wire art, and it's just too big for my hands. If you have medium or bigger hands, though, they're probably fine.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Ottaviano

customer_reviews.title: Good Cutting Pliers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool. I like my cutting pliers with an angled head so that I can use them to pull out cotter pins and nails. I also use them to cut off cotter pins and nails as well as general wire snipping. The tool seems well constructed and so far hasn't let me down. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase more if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Default Reality

customer_reviews.title: Great for cutting
customer_reviews.text: If you need a tool like this, get it. Great quality and is very convenient
customer_reviews.author: Shane Musser

customer_reviews.title: Great, for a short time
customer_reviews.text: Jaws became dull after a short period of use. There is now a visible gap between them with the pliers closed, resulting in incomplete or partial cuts.
customer_reviews.author: livefordrifting

customer_reviews.title: Grip is wierd
customer_reviews.text: The grip is a little awkward when using but it seems to work
customer_reviews.author: baker22

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works well as expected. I only had a short time, so I cannot rate durability.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Won’t easily cut 6 gauge wire
customer_reviews.text: But disappointed that these “heavy duty” wire cutters struggled to cut 6 gauge wire. I had to push hard and bend the wire at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but don’t have best angle for head
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a few months now and they’re good but don’t quite have the angle I was looking for. They’re comfortable and a decent size. They cut well but have dulled faster than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Forbis

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worthless. Would not cleanly cut 1/16" stainless wire rope.
customer_reviews.author: Willie Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Irwin
customer_reviews.text: These cutters are sharp, nicely made, and very durable. The handle grip is comfortable even on hard to cut wire, like fencing wire.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Strudy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Seems like they will last for a long time. Nice and sharp
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: Cutters seem very ergonomic and cuts well. You have to take care of any tool. I am happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Homer

customer_reviews.title: cost effective
customer_reviews.text: quick delivery, cost effective & exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: L Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great dikes!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these dikes for about 2 months now, and purchased them after I ruined my Klein tools dikes by cutting a hot wire. In comparison these work at least as well as the Klein tools dikes, but the handle is a bit more comfortable and seems to get more force because of the thicker handles. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: High quality diagonals
customer_reviews.text: These are great high quality diagonals. Every CNC repair tool box needs one of these inside for wire cutting, band cutting, plastic strip cutting, etc. Great visual recognition in the drawer for quick pick up, also. Lots of pliers are not made to high machinists standards. These are made to higher quality standards - these hinge and slide precisely and feel great in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: PM Prime

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Real nice set of cutters, smooth, easy one hand operation
customer_reviews.author: Carl Spackler

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a great price
customer_reviews.text: I liked the everything about this product. Especially the price.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Geneva

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool. The price and quality are wonderful. I use it every day with my electrical business.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Good for home use
customer_reviews.text: Good but not great. Like the comfort grip. More for the diy person not for a professional trade
customer_reviews.author: caitmac86

customer_reviews.title: Good side cutters
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice looking and practical to use. The long and non-slip handles make it easier to cut through materials with ease. They seem to be holding up well. The only thing is that sharpness/cutting capabilities of these side cutters is not quite what I was hoping for, I bought these to replace a pair of wore down Husky side cutters. The wore down Husky brand honestly still cuts better, but it is easier to cut things with these new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these pliers from Amazon because I wanted to get a good quality tool. After just a few uses they became loose. The “rivet” that holds the two halves together failed.
customer_reviews.author: Dave376

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: They do what they got to do. Sturdy and have good grips i know it a quality tool.
customer_reviews.author: dj play

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great at cutting but doesn't stay shut, you have to hold it with both hands because there is no tension like normal wire cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin White

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to fine
customer_reviews.text: Use them to clip off the pointy wire off the shower organizer, they were sharp enough and did the job
customer_reviews.author: VELVET KING

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only good for smaller wire. I have trouble Cutting #12 wire with these. Not the best but not bad
customer_reviews.author: Mr Klean

customer_reviews.title: Best cutters in my tool box
customer_reviews.text: They fit my hand well. They make the el cheapo's performance nothing but a frustration
customer_reviews.author: RogerS

customer_reviews.title: Vise Grip Pliers
customer_reviews.text: Solid tool, comfortable handle cover for fence work around on the property. Vise Grip is always good.
customer_reviews.author: Presley

customer_reviews.title: quality tool, fair price
customer_reviews.text: Used daily in commercial and industrial settings. Comfortable grip, cuts cleanly.
customer_reviews.author: Oryx

customer_reviews.title: Cut that thing
customer_reviews.text: These side cutters are great. Amazon is the best place to shop. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Ed Wilson

customer_reviews.title: MAKES SNIP SNIP SNIP a SNAP SNAP SNAP. High ...
customer_reviews.text: MAKES SNIP SNIP SNIP a SNAP SNAP SNAP. High quality of the pro variety. These cutting edge pliers are on fire!
customer_reviews.author: Reid Wells

customer_reviews.title: Good power at 8"
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy anything shorter if you want to cut with power. Product has lasted ok. Don't expect wonders at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Klaus

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cut through a couple of gold rings that were too small for me, and they went through them ridiculously easily. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mittenz

customer_reviews.title: IRWIN TOOLS VISE-GRIP Diagonal Wire Cutters.
customer_reviews.text: The IRWIN Tools Diagonal Cutters, are solid and very well made. I have used these cutters almost everyday for the last couple of months and they are still solid at the pivot joint, unlike the last Craftsman diagonals (at a higher price) that became sloppy loose in about 6 weeks. I recommend Irwin Tools without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Smith

customer_reviews.title: It passes muster...
customer_reviews.text: It'll cut through an auto battery cable just fine. Comfy grip too. I use these every day and I see no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: HonkyLips

customer_reviews.title: Mechanic automotive
customer_reviews.text: Works good so far i haven't used them on anything very heavy gauge yet.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job of cutting. It's kind of unwieldy without a return spring--wish it had one.
customer_reviews.author: Joel J

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These cut standard wire really well. The grips are comfortable. They are very well made.
customer_reviews.author: YoYo Professional

customer_reviews.title: Best cutting plier there is.
customer_reviews.text: By far the best cutting pliers I've used. Solid and well crafted. The handle covers are staying in place so far, unlike the cheaper brands. If you've ever had a pair(s) of the cheaper brands you know what quality is when you use this. THESE ARE QUALITY. Craftsman should be embarrassed.
customer_reviews.author: CRI

customer_reviews.title: Decent dikes
customer_reviews.text: I have been cutting 6 AWG wire with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: The best 8" Cutting Pliers you can get for $16
customer_reviews.text: The best 8" Cutting Pliers you can get for $16 Good Job IRWIN
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Decent Brand That I Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for my crafting. Heavy duty compared to the brands craft companies sell.
customer_reviews.author: Shari_C

customer_reviews.title: ... for about a year now and so far so good. Good quality and work great
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for about a year now and so far so good. Good quality and work great. No problems cutting steel cable or most materials. Ergonomic and a good size for general use.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Gets job done
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to hold and use. Cutting edge cuts thru wire with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are a great pair of cutters. As a parts puller at a junk yard I'm constantly snipping and cutting through stuff. These things work great! They make cutting through wires, steel, aluminum seem like you're cutting through butter! I would definitely recommend these and will buy them again if they ever dull or break.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy cutting of heavy duty wire
customer_reviews.text: Great diagonal cutters at a great price. Cushioned grips make cutting heavy gauge wire quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Blore

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for quality tool.
customer_reviews.text: Great value and good quality. I’ve had compliments on them.

customer_reviews.title: As Good As Klein's
customer_reviews.text: Cuts wire every bit as good as Klein's, so much cheaper.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pliers
customer_reviews.text: Nice pair of cutters. Great quality, feels good in the hand, very happy with it. Would recommend

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good wire cutters, they are sharp and do the job

customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize they would be so big, they seem to be good quality just bigger than expected

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product received it on time it's lasted through a lot of abuse. Definitely would recommend it to strong product

customer_reviews.title: Irwin Vise-Grip Diagonal Cutting Pliers 8 inches
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and weight of these pliers. The vinyl covering the handles also comes in handy while gripping the pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Poco457

customer_reviews.title: Irwin tools rock, reshore them!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and work well for the little electric I do around the house.... I have had off brand pliers and they are junk compared to these fine tools. I wish they made them here in the USA...........
customer_reviews.author: JAYNE DEFRANCO

customer_reviews.title: handels are biger than most must cutting tool I have ...
customer_reviews.text: handels are biger than most must cutting tool I have bought in the past ou don't feel pressure on your fingers when cutting large wires

customer_reviews.title: plyers
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought craftmans tool. These cut perfectly out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Al M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Excellent gripping surface, even through perspiration. Hardened and true cutting edges. Best price online through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: GrnMtnMan-Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Second pair, holding strong...
customer_reviews.text: First ones broke off at the tip too easily. Returned and receive another pair from Amazon, problem free, and they are holding up pretty good. Compared to the Klein ones I own, you can save about 50% of the cost of Klein's with these ones, they do the same job, and even look better.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin P.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and easily cuts 12 pair telephone lines and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and easily cuts 12 pair telephone lines and #6 Solid copper. Great grips as well. A good all around pair of dikes.

customer_reviews.title: It's a big tool
customer_reviews.text: It's a big tool, a little to large for my hands. But cuts great!
customer_reviews.author: GaryB

customer_reviews.title: High Quality product. Worth the Price.
customer_reviews.text: For anyone working in Telecom using cheap cutters...Please buy this! Worth it for the price and will pay for itself.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Irwin, nothing even comes close to any of there tools!
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Hall

product_meta.title: IRWIN VISE-GRIP Diagonal Cutting Pliers, 8-Inch (2078308)
product_meta.description:
The IRWIN VISE-GRIP Diagonal Cutting Pliers are constructed of durable nickel chromium steel with an induction-hardened cutting edge that stays sharper longer than traditional cutting edges. These pliers are fitted with non-slip ProTouch grips for increased comfort and reduced hand fatigue. Backed by the IRWIN Lifetime Guarantee, they meet or exceed ANSI specifications.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The IRWIN Vise-Grip 2078308 - 8" Diagonal Cutting Pliers have an induction hardened cutting edge that stays sharper, longer. The Pliers also have ProTouch grips that have molded handles for comfort and create less hand fatigue. All pliers meet or exceed ANSI specification.
feature_bullets: ProTouch grips provide extra comfort and reduces hand fatigue
Induction hardened cutting edge stays sharper, longer
Backed by the IRWIN VISE-GRIP Lifetime Guarantee

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars969 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
